1.1.name: wordpress/tfs-lolcat
1.1.description:
This is an extension of Dougal Campbell's Text Filter Suite, which is required for TFSLOLcat to work. Posts and comments can be changed to LOLcat-style language. By default, all posts and comments will be switched on the official LOLcat Day of 08 August (808 is the nickname for Hawaii, where icanhascheezburger originated).

Visit the plugin homepage for additional information.
